name: Corpse Reviver #2
description: Part of a class of "corpse reviver" cocktails—so named because of their purported ability to bring the dead (or at least painfully hungover) back to some semblance of life—this drink was a staple of bar manuals back in the 1930s, only to fall off the map in the last half of the 20th century.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; fill with ice and shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Of course, there are different (though similar) recipes for the Corpse Reviver #2; visit Kaiser Penguin to see a taste test of several versions.
